SwitchPreference.android:title: Check for available update
SwitchPreference.app:summary: When you start the app, it checks whether a new version is available and, if necessary, asks whether you want to open the download page.

SwitchPreference.android:title: Automatically connect to all available cameras
SwitchPreference.app:summary: As soon as the app has been started, the availability of the listed cameras is continuously checked. If a camera becomes available, it will be connected automatically. Sleeping cameras may turn on during this process.

SwitchPreference.android:title: Ignore the cameras 'Auto Off' setting
SwitchPreference.app:summary: Models older than Hero9 cannot be kept alive through the app. If the "Auto Off" setting is not set to "NEVER", you will get a notification if it should not be ignored.

SwitchPreference.android:title: Keep camera alive even when app is paused
SwitchPreference.app:summary: Keeps the camera alive even when the app is paused if the camera supports the keepAlive command. If disabled, the camera will turn off after the programmed Auto Off time.

SwitchPreference.android:title: Check for firmware updates
SwitchPreference.app:summary: Checks the camera's firmware once it is connected. If new firmware is available, a message will be displayed.
